name: /tpa
description: Teleport to a player or town

name: /tpaccept
description: Accept a teleport request from another player

name: /town spawn
description: Teleport to your town's spawn point.

name: /confirm
description: Confirm town invites, deletions, leaving and some other things.

name: /town kick
description: Kick a player from your town. Only usable by the mayor or players with the required permission.
